messages.message: Hey team, I’ve had some thoughts about the Home page. There’s isn’t a very clear CTA hierarchy.
Can you elaborate more, why the 2 buttons should not have the same description "Open App"?
Eye is drawn to both "open app" buttons immediately, and it's not clear what the difference is until you look up and read the text above.

@Kerry  sorry i can be clearer: (this is just a subjective opinion)
• They both do different things.
• But the styling on the buttons are the same, and have the same wording.
• So it’s not every clear they’re separate apps.
• Particularly if you don’t know that Converse and Build are the names of apps
